message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a truly unique and valuable asset.  While I can't disclose all the details, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me, and I believe it has the potential to be even more valuable to the right person. I'm confident this product will be a significant asset to your portfolio.  I'm offering it to you at a price of $1000000.  This represents a considerable opportunity for you, and I'm sure you won't regret it.  Please let me know your decision.
